means: 全神贯注的，专心致志的
使全神贯注( engross的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Tony didn't notice because he was too engrossed in his work.
sentence.Network_cn: 托尼因为太专注于自己的工作而毫未察觉。

sentence.Network_en: The student is engrossed in his book.
sentence.Network_cn: 这名学生正在专心致志地看书.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语专业八级核心词汇_普特英语听力 ... encumbrance n 阻碍累赘妨害物 engrossed 全神贯注的 enigma n 谜不可思议的东西.
美国大学翻译中文 3 - geovindu的日志 -... ... 专心 concentration 专心 engrossed 专心一意 self-absorption.
专心致志（engrossed） 《孟子告子上》：今夫奕之为数，小数也，不专心致志，则不得也。
2010同等学力申硕英语模拟题2答案_百度文库 ... B.supposedly 信以为真地; A.engrossed 专心的,全神贯注的; B.obliged 被迫的.

list.abs: as a great fighting game and as an engrossing social experience ., 作为一个伟大的格斗游戏 , 作为一个引人入胜的社会经验.
法官 judge书记员 engrossment clerk检察官 procurator
research on the infield engross and its distributing in fujian ., 福建耕地占用及其分布研究.
It ' s an engrossing story ., 这是个引人入胜的故事.

entry.def: If you are engrossed in something, it holds your attention completely.

example.ex: Tony didn't notice because he was too engrossed in his work.
example.tran: 托尼因为太专注于自己的工作而毫未察觉。

sentences.sentence: "so intent on this fantastic...narrative that she hardly stirred"- Walter de la Mare

means.word_mean: 2. written formally in a large clear script, as a deed or other legal document

auth_sentence.content: Then I got engrossed in the show and forgot about it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then I got engrossed in the show and forgot about it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then I got engrossed in the show and forgot about it.

auth_sentence.content: Sometimes I was too engrossed in my book to pay any attention.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sometimes I was too engrossed in my book to pay any attention.

auth_sentence.content: In one, a tardy bee engrossed herself among the shutting petals.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: In one, a tardy bee engrossed herself among the shutting petals.

sentences.en: He seemed completely engrossed in his book.
sentences.cn: 他好像完全被他的那本书迷住了。

sentences.en: The student is engrossed in his book.
